Shifty Maneuver.name: Shifty Maneuver
Shifty Maneuver.sourceRef: Monster Manual, Into the Unknown: The Dungeon Survival Handbook
Shifty Maneuver.flavor: You call on your natural ability to dodge danger, taking your tribemates along for the ride.
keywords:
Close burst 2

Target: You and each ally in the burst

Effect: Each target can shift 1 square as a free action.
Shifty Maneuver.target: You and each ally in the burst
Shifty Maneuver.effect: Each target can shift 1 square as a free action.

Flee!.name: Flee!
Flee!.sourceRef: Into the Unknown: The Dungeon Survival Handbook
Flee!.flavor: You lead your tribemates in a hasty retreat.
keywords:
Close burst 2

Effect: Each ally in the burst gains a +2 power bonus to all defenses against opportunity attacks until the end of your next turn. You then shift up to your speed.
Flee!.effect: Each ally in the burst gains a +2 power bonus to all defenses against opportunity attacks until the end of your next turn. You then shift up to your speed.

Load Slingpot.name: Load Slingpot
Load Slingpot.sourceRef: Into the Unknown: The Dungeon Survival Handbook
Load Slingpot.flavor: You hurl a hastily enchanted projectile from your sling.
keywords:
Personal

Effect: You load your sling with a random type of ammunition. The next time you hit with a ranged basic attack with this sling before the end of your next turn, it has one of the following additional effects. Roll a d6 to determine the ammunition type.
Load Slingpot.effect:
You load your sling with a random type of ammunition. The next time you hit with a ranged basic attack with this sling before the end of your next turn, it has one of the following additional effects. Roll a d6 to determine the ammunition type.
    1–2 Stinkpot: The target takes a -2 penalty to attack rolls until the end of its next turn.
    3–4 Firepot (Fire): The target takes ongoing 2 fire damage (save ends).
    5–6 Gluepot: The target is immobilized until the end of its next turn.

Tunnel Scuttle.name: Tunnel Scuttle
Tunnel Scuttle.sourceRef: Into the Unknown: The Dungeon Survival Handbook
Tunnel Scuttle.flavor: You scramble up walls and through narrow spaces with ease.
keywords:
Personal

Effect: You move up to your speed. During this movement, you have a climb speed equal to your speed, and can move at full speed while squeezing.
Tunnel Scuttle.effect: You move up to your speed. During this movement, you have a climb speed equal to your speed, and can move at full speed while squeezing.

Frantic Shift.name: Frantic Shift
Frantic Shift.sourceRef: Into the Unknown: The Dungeon Survival Handbook
Frantic Shift.flavor: You hustle in and out of the fray quickly.
keywords:
Personal

Effect: You shift 1 square.

Special: The first time you are bloodied in an encounter, you regain the use of this power.
Frantic Shift.special: The first time you are bloodied in an encounter, you regain the use of this power.

Trap-Gang Method.name: Trap-Gang Method
Trap-Gang Method.sourceRef: Into the Unknown: The Dungeon Survival Handbook
Trap-Gang Method.flavor: You treat an enemy like a trusted member of a kobold trap-gang team. That is, you shove it in front of the trap.
keywords:
Special

Trigger: You are damaged by an attack from a trap or a hazard while a nonminion creature is adjacent to you.

Effect: You take only half damage from the triggering attack, and one nonminion creature adjacent to you takes the other half.
